name: Squash and Dash
description:
Top down, competitive, local multiplayer in which you control a member of the Giant Bomb crew and use a  giant slidey block to squash people with.

Can be played up to 4 players, you need controllers though*.

I made a very big boo boo and left Drew out of the line-up and only realised at the last minute, sorry about that.

If people enjoy it I might work on it more adding music, bonus rounds and power-ups based on past Giant Bomb features and moments.

*1st and 2nd player can use a keyboard or a controller, the keyboard controls for player 1 are WASD to move the character, IJKL to move the block and space bar to dash. Player 2 uses arrow keys, num pad 8,4,5,6 and numpad 0 respectively.
